content.detailedDescription: It was a nice sunny day and i was going over to my best friends house just after 10am. and as i was walking out to my car i happened to look up to the west and saw what i assumed was a jetliner, but it was going really slow. i kept looking up at it thinking that plane is going to stall out and crash cause i didn't hear anything, it was completely silent. it was headed directly toward dia as so many planes do like it was making it's final approach. but then i was thinking to myself, "that doesn't look right". i had aircraft identification in civil air patrol and couldn't see any wings or engines. but i thought maybe i'm seeing it at a bad angle and if i keep watching it i'll see a wing or engine. the whole time thinking it's going too slow. then i noticed this thing doesn't even have a tail, there was no tail or stabilizer(rudder). i kept walking to my car and looking up at it every few seconds. i got in my car and as the car was warming up, i watched it more intently and noticed the windows running the length of the fuselage were bigger than a passenger plane has. they were more rectangler and bigger than planes have. i hadn't noticed it sooner because there was a dark blue thick stripe running down the length of the middle of the fuselage. above and below the blue stripe the rest of the fuselage was metallic like a lot of planes. that's why i didn't really notice at first this thing didn't have wings or engines because of the blue stripe. as i started driving i turned the corner of my street going very slow so i could keep watching it, looking away for just a second or two (didn't want to hit one of the parked cars on the street). all of a sudden i looked back up and it was gone. so i pulled over and looked around everywhere, it was gone! there were no trees or obstructions of any kind. i thought maybe i was wrong about it and kept looking for it or a plumb of smoke and fire from a plane crash. i never did see it or any fire or smoke. as slow as it was going i would have seen it if it was a plane going in that direction.
content.summary: I first thought it was a passenger plane, it was headed in the direction of dia

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Back ground: i am new to a property where i work at night for 12 hours at a time outside in the middle of no where. odd things happen there that have made me pay attention to my surroundings more and outside all i have to do is watch the sky. 

driving into work right after dusk a very very unusually bright light caught the corner of my left eye. i thought this was odd because airplanes don't have lights that bright. i watched for a second to see if it was moving and it was stationary. i pulled over on the side of the road to watch it more closely and it was stationary right above the clouds. it looked like a really bright white star but it would go from dim and looking like a tiny white dot, to very very brilliantly bright white and than it would disappear and reappear in the same place or stay above the clouds and it did this over and over again and finally disappeared. i was stunned and told a few guys in my break room what i saw right down the street from work. to my surprise they were not surprised because they have seen ufos there. one guy actually taped one and it was all over the news and investigators came out to our work and there is a video of it on youtube. (mclane/western ufo sighting if you google it) what i saw was what the other guys saw in the past only the ufo was closer when they saw it last year. they told me they always see stuff that makes them take a second look out there at night. 

this was my 3rd ufo sighting in my lifetime (28 yrs), 2nd in colorado. 1st was when i was a kid one was 50 foot above our car in nj and my mother forbids our family from talking about it ever and still does, 2nd was about 2 years ago husband and i saw a brown cigar one over the mountains doing zigzag lines than it took off, and now this one when i was alone. i was always semi curious about ufos all my life because of the event that happened when i was a kid and because my uncle used to talk about being abducted but after this sighting i am full on interested and i am unafraid of them and i want to know more.
content.summary: Stationary very bright light that would disappear, reappear, go bright dim, dark

content.detailedDescription:
date: approximately 12-28-2011: or one day before or after at most.  time: late night: 10:30pm--1:30 am.  reporting it this late because it occurred to me that it may help someone else.  i first thought it maybe was a nova, and looked for it in the news--there were no novas reported. 
      
i was sitting in a chair in my backyard looking up at the sky for over half an hour(just thinking about the year behind me) before i settled on looking at what i took to be a star. there is a power line going to my house just under the object(approximately one moons diameter), making a good reference point.  

i was staring right at the "star", lost in thought, for at least 10 minutes when it quickly got 3-4 times bigger, and at the same time brighter, then just blinked out--gone.  it had been stationary, quiet,a steady white light,and, i would guess, miles away--towards downtown los angeles from me, but who really knows how far.

i know the flight paths around here, and they are not in the same area, and they are ruled out anyway because this was a stationary light for over 10 minutes, on a clear night.  that is all. i had just slight puzzlement and some excitement to think i may have seen a star go supernova. i will add that after it blinked out, i remained sitting out back, so total time was probably an hour to an hour and a half.
content.summary: Saw what i took to be stationary star.  after staring at it 10 min, it got several times bigger and brighter, then blinked out(gone).

content.detailedDescription:
From december 23rd through december 25th i have seen the same light in the sky. on december 23rd, around 7:00pm just after dusk i was walking my dogs when i say an extremly bright white large light very low on the horizon. i was so blown away that i stopped and took a video of the light. it stood out to me because it was so much brighter than anything in the sky. a helicopter started circling it and after observing for an hour or so i brought the dogs back in the house. when i came back out an hour later the light was gone. 

one december 24th, the exact same thing happened. i took pictures this time to record what i saw. i started to assume this had to be a star if it re-appeared the very next night. 

december 25th, i had showed my family the video and they explained it away saying that this had to be a star. so that evening i ran outside to see if it was there again and no it wasnt. we went out for christmas dinner and on our way home around 9:00pm as we are driving on the 118 freeway my boyfriend says "oh my gosh i see the light". everyone in the car was amazed as the light was so low and bright it was impossible to be a star or plane. we quickly got off the freeway and as i was going to take video the light was gone. it just disappeared.
content.summary: Bright low light over san fernando/sylmar area

content.detailedDescription: I work for wright patterson afb as a teenager for the summer as a laborer and the old timers there told me a storyabouta group of big shots there that were guarded by armed guardsmen and they couldn'tget close but they saw coffin like objects being dumped in a tar pit on the base.
content.summary: Old timers at wright patterson

content.detailedDescription:
1. franklin, tn..Running afternoon errands
2. after looking at pic and back into sky
3. no idea, maybe a drone?
4. just traveling in a straight path
5. feeling confused, weirded out
6. stopping looking, went on my way
content.summary: Just saw in sky,

content.detailedDescription: On 12/25/2013 around 7pm just letting out the dogs.   i noticed 5 redish orange lights in the  south east sky.   i thought that was a little wierd for planes for a landing pattern. i then called my husband to come and look.   2 more appeared.    now there is 7 objects.   they hovered in a path then started to move in other directions.  then back to the path pattern again.  this lasted about 30 minutes.  then they dissappeared.
content.summary: 7 red_orange lights

content.detailedDescription: Email me and i will reply with my story. it was witnessed in multiple counties, published in the newspaper, then buried. email me back and i will tell you what happened.
content.summary: 1.5 to 2+ miles wide. documented in local paper

content.detailedDescription:
This has happened four of the last five times i have visited this area. three times i have had a witness with me.  twice with my friend wendy who lives just south of this sandy area on dennis street who's dog walks here are responsible for me noticing the phenomena here.  i work at her house occasionally on a unique experimental solar project so i visit the area frequently.  the last time i went at date above had my buddy bill with me and no dogs this time.

i look for abnormal things wherever i am but particularly so in desert environments because i believe alien cultures visit these areas most frequently due to the lower risk of being observed or chased/captured.

the first time any of is saw the lights was a cold night in october this year.  my friend wendy wanted to walk her dogs and i wanted to go to so we went together with the dogs.  we walked from her house north up dennis st then went west on kay st a half block and cut between the houses parallel to the alleyway north to el mirage rd then went west a hundred feet or so then turned north on muskrat ave which is a dirt road here as any "roads" are in the area north of el mirage rd or kay st.

we were maybe a half mile or so north of the development tract to the south when i looked straight ahead and noticed the lights of many colors dancing across the horizon at what appears to be the foot of hills to the north and then also observed them cross crossing each other in ways with medium speed and no inertia about face maneuvers and evens loop-de-loops starting from what appeared to be ground level.

like i said i have seen these lights out here after dark at varying times between after sunset and midnight four of the last five times i have been out there.  they are clearly not cars in the desert because no car could instantaneously change direction like these do particularly on sand.   sometimes the lights look hazy or indistinct like the glow from a cheap led flashlight with multiple leds.  this is when it looks like they are coming at us and going away from is for the most part.  sometimes they look clearly distinct and that is only at a distance from us if our senses are not being fooled.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Playful multiple colors of lights observed in all desert area north of housing tract.  avoid photography and binoculars.

content.detailedDescription:
About to park in my garage
the light were so bright that they caught my eye
i looked up and immediately called my 2 buddies
they came to see the objects less than 1 min later
three orange balls were moving in the sky in various directions
and then formed a triangle and then moved away from each other
i filmed it with my iphone but isn't very clear.
all three of us were not scared but in awe.
the three objects sped away at regular speeds but in different directions.
content.summary: Big bright orange lights...Triangle then seperated

content.detailedDescription: i noticed out of the north about 2 am a long object zipping all around. the object had a red light that was very bright that would seem to light the way. as the object zipped all around i noticed it landed and a humanoid figure exited the craft. the humanoid seemed to be doing something but as soon as it landed it was took off again.. i could hear a sound like silverware being dropped or some some sort of bell sound and a deep sound. now it is going to sound crazy but it the sound was like a ho ho ho sound. i know what you are thinking but the object took off going west and would zip around then land and take off many times and very fast. each time the same sounds would follow and a sparkle trail of glitter behind. very magical and mysterious.
content.summary: Long object with red light in front zipping up and down

content.detailedDescription: Walking dog xmas night at ski resort in co. noticed strange light in sky blinking red green blue and brilliant white. got two witnesses and a cruddy video. looked at it thru binoculars. stayed there for at least 45m then we went inside. no way it was star. saw several planes. it was way up in the sky cause i was at 10k feet on a prefectly cloudless night. i did call police to see if anyone else reported anything. they said no. wild stuff. really unexplainable. there could have been a second object lower in sky but it was behind top of mtn and trees. this all happened between 9 and 10 mtn time. let me know if you want the vid.
content.summary: Extremely bright flashing red green blue white stationary above 30 k feet not a star

content.detailedDescription: My son and his father were in my driveway watching for approx 5 minutes before calling my out.  they saw all three lights. the first light "shot up very fast and disappeared'.  the second light "faded out".  the third light i witnessed moved very slowly. the airplanes in view moved a lot faster than the light. the light didn't flash like an airplane, it was steadily glowing. i tried to video it with my phone but i couldn't see the light on camera.  it faded slightly then got to full brightness again.  then it began to fade until the light was gone. after it had been dark for a few seconds, i saw a zig zag streak so fast i question if i even saw the streak but i know i did.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 orange lights  1 assended very fast the other 2 moved slowly eventually faded out

content.detailedDescription: I walked into my bathroom, which has a window facing the north, and noticed two "stars", glowing yellow, relatively low on the horizon, one was about 40 degrees and the other was 20 degrees over the horizon. they were bright, and usually stars can't be seen from my house because of light pollution from the streetlights, but these were pretty clear. i watched the bodies and observed that the lights slowly dimmed and then brightened again. then, a third light appeared, even lower in the horizon than the first one, with the same strange dimming and brightening pattern. as the first one passed over the house, i observed a red light on one side and a green light on the other, with two yellow lights in the middle. i know it sounds like they were airplanes, but it is extremely uncommon for low flying airplanes to pass over my house because there are no local airports. also, instead of making sounds like a normal jet would, it made more of a humming buzz. also, the second and third lights, as they got closer, rose in the horizon. at first i thought they were going to crash into trees they were so low. i lost sight of the objects as they passed over my house. while watching the objects, i felt nervous because i wasn't sure if they were crashing airplanes, i had never seen anything like them before. i did some research on google and the light description matches that of an airplane, but because there were three of them that passed overhead in a matter of ten minutes, and the yellow lights in the middle dimmed and brightened, they do not seem to have been normal planes. my brother, who also saw the lights, and i are extremely curious as to what we witnessed.
content.summary: Two white lights in middle, one red and green, lights came on and off

content.detailedDescription: Looking out plane window while ascending above the clouds below when notice a grey circle out the window just hovering. i took 2 photos as it maintained in the same area and lost sight as plane continued ahead.
content.summary: Notice object when watching out plane window.

content.detailedDescription: When i turned into my neighborhood, i noticed what looked like a star. however i noticed the light was moving. then i noticed five other pink-orange lights in a straight line in front of it. i rolled down window to see if i could hear any sound and there was no sound. each light disappeared as it reached a large cloud and they never came back out.
content.summary: Six lights traveling in straight line with no sound

content.detailedDescription: At around 10 minutes after 10pm tuesday 12/24/13, i walked my mother and sister outside to their car as they were leaving the christmas party at my house here in austintown, ohio. as my mother turned to get into her driver's side door, she looked up and exclaimed "wow look at those". my sister and i turned around, and overhead of the house were three bright orange/red orbs moving from east to west directly. we had only 35 seconds to observe them before they went into a cloud bank. they were low, maybe 2,000-3,000 ft off the ground, so very observable and clearly seen. another strange part was, after they disappeared into the clouds, my mother and sister left and i went back inside the house. i waited for about 5-10 minutes and went back outside, and looked up. the rather large cloud bank that they disappeared into had also disappeared and the sky was completely clear and dark with all the stars visible. however the objects were nowhere in sight either. i have attached a photo that is not from the event, but it shows exactly what we saw. the photo is really close to our observations.
content.summary: I walked outside with my sister and mother and my mother looked up and told us to look. three bright orange red balls in the sky in a triangular pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Madera, ca. 15 years old maybe, i was coming home to madera from disneyland with a church youth group around 1990 in a chevy sprint. we had some short range hand-held radios in each of maybe 4 or 5 cars so we wouldn't get separated in los angeles. it was about 2am. we got off freeway 99 out at ave 12 (southern outskirts of madera)and turned left going back over the freeway facing west to take the first guy home when some girls in one of the other cars went nuts on the radio talking about a ufo. i was dozing off in the front passenger seat. the driver and the guy sitting behind me were wide awake. the other guy was completely asleep for this entire experience. when the girls started yelling about the ufo i started to wake up. as we came down off the overpass the driver slowed down as he looked at the object. firstly, i have to say that all i ever saw was a light. my eyes were blurry from sleep. the other 2 guys, who were not prone to exaggeration at all, said that they saw a saucer shape with a rectangular window and 3 or 4 humanoid shapes in the window. again, i just saw a light and it was about 1000 ft away and 1000 ft up. when i first saw it, it was moving very slowly from south to north (my left to right). then it stopped still. all at once, our car's engine and lights shut off. so did the car's stereo and the hand-held radio. the driver just said, "wow!" or "wo!" or something like that. i asked him what happened, but he just shook his head and said he didn't do it. then the object/light in the sky shot from it's position to about 1000 ft or so to the right (north) and stopped dead still again. it didn't accelerate. it just went from 0 to full speed in an instant then stopped dead still again without slowing down. it stayed there for a second or two then it shot up again, but this time at about a 45 degree angle up and away from us into or through the atmosphere and looked like it shot right into space. basically, when it left it looked like a shooting star going the wrong way. at the same time, the car's lights and the radios both came back on. the driver just put the sprint back in neutral and pushed the clutch in and started the engine back up. the guy that was sleeping was the one we dropped off first and he never even woke up until we were letting him out. i got dropped off 2nd and i ran to my door and almost dropped my keys trying to get inside because i was shaking so badly. now that i'm older i don't believe it was little green men. i'm sure there is some form of life out there somewhere, but i think the military was having fun with us or testing something that night. the only thing that isn't easily explainable is the thing's movements. i often wonder if all i was seeing was some kind of light or projection. it just moved too fast to be believable. what happened to the car was real enough, though. i just wish i had been completely awake and my eyes had been 100%.
content.summary: 4 men in car. 3 see hovering craft. car and electronics shut down. craft shoots out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my family father mother and grandmother were traveling through glenville in greenwich, ct at 6:48 pm when i observed over the horizon 6 red twinkling lights in the sky that were slowly ascending at a moderate low altitude.  i notified my father driving the jeep and we found a place to pull over and check out the situation a seventh light came over the tree line as we stopped.  

the lights were traveling northwest as observed from north hawthorne st as it passed over rye, ny and glenville into portchester where westchester county airport is.  during the five minutes we observed two helicopters pass under the lights from our perspective without any suspicious behavior.  

prior to seeing the lights we saw a few commercial airplanes coming or going to the airport also without any behavior to note.  the lights made no noise they simply floated and twinkled.  we left after five minutes because 5 or 6 had either faded away or were hidden by a tree line but likely faded away.  

i believe these were spherical luminosities however perhaps for christmas someone released floating lanterns ceremonially but they were very noticeable.
content.summary: 7 red spherical luminosities

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on lassiter mill road near asheboro, nc at about 10:30 a.M. on christmas morning 2013. i'm sitting in the backseat of my father's truck traveling south. i looked up in the sky to my right at about two o'clock and at that time i seen a silver / whitish orb cross in front of the moon traveling at a high rate of speed and then all the sudden it just disappeared. it left no constrail whatsoever  and was at a very high altitude. there was a jet to the left of it in the sky leaving a contrail.  the moon looked to be about the size of aspirin in sky and  the orb was the size of a star as it crossed in front of it. the entire incident lasted only about 30 to 45 seconds. that is about as accurate description that i can give.
content.summary: Orb crossed in front of moon

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside at approximately 9:10pm and noticed a red light as it emerged from behind a tree that obscures the most eastern viewpoint of my property. bigger than a star, more like a plane only not flashing and soundless,  glowing halfway up from the horizon in the night sky. as it moved east to west another appeared from same spot and then another. i saw about 3 at a time moving in a straight line. as they moved slowly they seemed to change direction, possibly moving south, dimming a bit and then vanished suddenly instead of fading away.

probably saw about 5 before going inside to grab my camera. they were still following the same pattern when a i came back but when i tried to see them through my tablet to record i couldn't see them. i saw everything else but no red lights. when i looked with my eyes they were there but with my large tablet screen nothing.

i don't know exactly when they first appeared as they were going full force when i first noticed them but the whole thing lasted maybe 8 minutes and then there were no more. when i played back the video, everything in the night sky, stars, trees, planes etc... showed perfectly, but there was not even an inkling of the red lights.
content.summary: Red starlike lights moving east to west the turned south and vanished

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were going out to the car at about 9:15 - 9:30 christmas eve.  i looked up to the northeast over my house and saw a very bright red globe hovering in the distance.  expecting it to be a helicopter i realized it was not flashing and was not quite the right shade of red.  i pointed this out to my family and they watched it with me.  it did not move but seemed to be hovering up above everything emitting no sounds (this is what was disturbing) after watching it we got in the car to go along in that direction keeping an eye on it when a secondary object dropped from the main one slowly going down leaving a small trail.  as it headed down it sped up in its decent out of sight.  after that the main object literally just disappeared.  we told some family members and my brother in law saw it on his way home after it was split in two.  this left us (3/4) with a very odd feeling as it was so unusual and hoping we get an answer.
content.summary: Bright red light in the northeast sky about 9:15 on the 24th of december 2013.  after abserving for several minutes with family smaller object detatched, slowly fell, almost like leaf, then accelerated downwards out of sightline.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the back yard with my wife and daughter, christmas eve, three bright yellow-orange lights appeared from the north, travelling south.  the third light was initially behind the first two , but was travelling faster and caught up, the three then flew together in a loose formation. i initially thought they were jet fighters but did not recognize the color as anything normally associated with an airplane, there were no white strobes, red or green nav lights, no rotating beacon, just the bright yellow glow. i expected to hear the jet noise any second but there was none, absolutely silent. the first three disappeared behind our house, then two more appeared in the north sky following the same path overhead. the last one appeared to accelerate and catch up with the fourth object, they remained close together after that. those two flew overhead and disappeared to the south like the first three. again no sound, and they traversed the sky overhead in 7-10 seconds. i could not make out any shape, i would estimate their altitude at greater than 10k ft. the speed and bright glowing color were unlike anything i have ever seen, i have been involved in aviation my entire life.
content.summary: A group of 3 , then 2 more yellow/orange bright lights appeared overhead travelling north to south,. appeared to be very high altitude and no sound,  travelling at a very high speed.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of december 24 at just after 10 pm, my son, his gf and i saw 7 objects flying approximately 1 mile away over our area in frisco.  they were moving fast (speed unknown), glowing yellow and red.  there looked to be blinking lights in the middle of the objects, which looked to be small bun-shaped craft.   they came in three sets of two objects followed by a single craft that looked to be spaced in the middle back, flying from the south (from plano/dallas, but not in the direction of dfw or love field), flying on a north/northwest path.  all of the objects were silent; we listened for any noise but did not hear any coming from either the direction of the object or behind them.   as soon as they passed by, the yellow/red color faded immediately to the outline of the sky and they disappeared.   i immediately ran towards the back of the house and looked in the same direction for them but neither saw nor heard anything.   my son and his gf attempted to take pictures (with their cell phones) but nothing could be seen.
content.summary: Saw 7 evenly spaced silent yellow/red objects

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting relatives in garden grove on christmas eve.  i had driven up from san diego and had just gotten to their house.  i said a few hellos and then went out into the street to smoke a cigar.  it was 10:15 pm.  i was standing near the corner of scadia street and stanford ave. (exact address omitted).  i was looking southwest.  there was a bright orangish red light almost hovering; but moving toward me.  at an arms length, maybe 2 to 4 fingers above the house roof across and one house south of me.  after watching it 30 seconds or so, two slightly bluish white teardrop spheres of light fell from the orangish red light straight down.  they seemed to be going faster than if they were just falling.  they were not beams; but lighted objects or spheres of light.  these bluish white lights were a color i can not describe accurately; but laser-like would be the closest description.  not only laser-like, but even more vibrant than laser-like.  this light seemed like it had depth or maybe partially transparent; but brilliant.  i have never seen anything like them.  they were not round orbs, teardrop or at least much longer than they were wide in shape.  again, they did not seem the fall; but were propelled downward.   they were not lite all the way down, but winked out before they went below the roof top southwest of me.  anyway, i was excited, to say the least.  the orangish red light then turned in a quick motion and was heading almost away from me, slowly. it started to fade first, and then pulsed on and off and then was gone. it didn't seem to dart away fast; but seemed to wink out.  this was now about 1 minute from when i first saw it.  then 4 minutes later, the orangish red light appeared again.  this time it was slightly further away but moving quickly towards me again.  when it got to about the same place the bluish white lights had ejected from it; it even got a little brighter.  it again, arced away, or turned 180 degrees and quickly went away, or faded out as it moved away.  i was never scared, but i sure have been wide awake and have been thinking about it for the last 6 hours.  i keep thinking about those bluish white lights.  they were such a unique shape and brilliance.  i was only able to fill out this form when i got back to san diego.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slowly moving orangish red light ejects two bluish white teardrop lights in garden grove

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1:40/45 in the morning i was sitting in my truck in a parking lot talking with a friend. he pointed out the driver window and said "what is that?" i looked and saw 5-6 small red/orange lights flying in the air. my first thought was reflection on my window so i rolled it down but that wasn't it. we got out and watched as they flew in a loose formation. the lights appeared to flicker slightly not flash or remain constant as aircraft. there was no noise at all. i was watching the brightest one in the back when my friend said the front ones just faded away. a few seconds later the last one faded away as well. there were clouds and they did appear to fade into the clouds but there was no visible light behind the clouds. approximately 10-12 min later i saw the lights reappear again with no noise. again they were in a loose formation and again faded away. they were not simply floating randomly but were directed somehow. there were fewer the second time. video was taken with iphone 5s.
content.summary: 5-7 small, red/orange lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: That was interesting. i just saw a ufo over the lake. it did a really fast almost figure 8 travelling in an up to down towards the ground motion, and then a few seconds later there was a brilliant round white flash up from where i last saw it. nothing spectacular, just something like i have never seen before.
content.summary: Weird figure 8 and then circle flash

content.detailedDescription: I was with my son we had been on the bus coming towards home we decided to go see the movie the avengers we got off the bus @main and stapley on the se corner we started walking towards the theatre which was south on stapley across the freeway bout 8 min walk my son asked me about the super moon my phone was a casio commando it has various tools for nav so i was going to see if it gave me any info on it we stopped i turned on the app to see and we were facing south i looked toward my son to my right and noticed a police chopper and lights trailing it at about a quarter mile or so heading east on main st i told my son to look, i had my phone in my hand with no thought of taking any pictures we both watched as the chopper came towards us at about 180 ft with the lights in tow but i noticed the lights blinking out as it got to about 75 from my 90 the remaining lights shot up fanned out and blinked out the one that was traveling parallel with the chopper left an emty space in thw cloud as it disappeared my son said what were those i said those were aliens and called my wife freaking out then called my friend fernando oh and two dps officer seemed to see them also peeled out from in front of my pos went s on stapley then i continued on to see the avengers with my son
content.summary: Looked like chinese lanterns following mesa police chopper the blinked out when the were over head the last 4 fanned out went through the clouds one left a trail through the cloud above me its light was off but could see a part in the cloud

content.detailedDescription: Driving home when my wife and i saw a red light in the sky. it caught my eye because i am always looking up for strange lights. i asked my wife what she thought and she recommended that we pull over so i did. when we pulled over i could tell that it wasn't moving because i judged it through my view through the trees. i told my wife that we should hurry home and grab the video camera and hopefully it would still be there. got home ran inside grabbed my camera and got it into view just in time to see it drop another orb but this one was flashing. it was moving down slowly then stopped and almost seemed to come back up. then the flashing object went back down and stopped for a second then shot down to the ground. i didn't realize the speed of the objects decent until watching the video back in slow motion. it was like a bullet and didn't make a sound. after the second object was out of view i zoomed in on the initial object and it flickered and blinked out.
content.summary: Red craft dropped a flashing orb that stalled out then shot down to the ground

content.detailedDescription:
I went to alpine az to stay in a cabin for a few days near nutrioso. i drove into springerville to grab some chips, dinty more cans, soups etc..I placed the cans on the counter (high counter, 40 inches) with other food. the counter is inverted l shape. the lower part of the l was the counter and the vertical would be the sink, stove area. i need to draw the room layout for you to understand the extreme oddness of the position. i watched open range, walked into kitchen area where sink is in the nook of the l. i placed plate and glass into the sink and was headed to bed around 9:00 - 9:15 typical bedtime for me. i was thinking about what room to sleep, the guest or masters. then... 

i woke up on my back, face to ceiling and head facing door, the door rug in front of my head halfway pushed up the door. puzzling, since the rug has non-slip bottom i was about 2 feet away from the door, and my feet were facing other direction, and my back hurt severely. but my head and rest of body felt perfect (having arthritis) was not something i have felt in a long time. almost euphoric.  

i stood up and went to the bathroom and looked into the mirror and them turned around and looked at my back. there was a large round circle in the center of my back. almost the exact size of dinty more can, or some other can of food. i walked into the kitchen and examined the entire scene, no cans were moved, fell off but still stacked in a pyramid. then i noticed the rug was not only half up the door, but it was upside down and this was very odd. i had swept the floor when i entered the cabin, shook the rug out in and placed it right side up, black rubber bottom and polyester top.
how can i slip and fall, with my head, feet 8 feet away and angled out of the room? nasty red circle in my back that i cannot reach. i later showed several others the next weekend. that is how long this was there. it did not bruise at all, slowly faded away. 

i have never had any black outs, seizures. so i continued with the rest of the days there. when i got home, i began to have issues with memory, for example, names, places, dates. this affected me as i was a grad student. since this incident, i now struggle with concentration issues starting exactly when this happened.
content.summary: Woke up in strange place in the cabin
